short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your photos in Google Drive for a slideshow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I quick app I made to replicate the WinXP photos screensaver for my dad. It uses the enclosing folder of the image as a title.

Source is on github: https://github.com/pkulak/drive-slideshow
